trans-unit.source: Setting a Storage Analytics Data Retention Policy
trans-unit.target: Setting a Storage Analytics Data Retention Policy

trans-unit.source: By default, Storage Analytics will not delete any logging or metrics data.
trans-unit.target: By default, Storage Analytics will not delete any logging or metrics data.

trans-unit.source: Blobs and table entities will continue to be written until the shared 20TB limit is reached.
trans-unit.target: Blobs and table entities will continue to be written until the shared 20TB limit is reached.

trans-unit.source: Once the 20TB limit is reached, Storage Analytics will stop writing new data and will not resume until free space is available.
trans-unit.target: Once the 20TB limit is reached, Storage Analytics will stop writing new data and will not resume until free space is available.

trans-unit.source: This 20TB limit is independent of the total limit for your storage account.
trans-unit.target: This 20TB limit is independent of the total limit for your storage account.

trans-unit.source: For more information on storage account limits, see <legacyLink xlink:href="26df4d89-8289-4b31-aaa0-df971cab9b52" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Azure Storage Scalability and Performance Targets</legacyLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information on storage account limits, see <legacyLink xlink:href="26df4d89-8289-4b31-aaa0-df971cab9b52" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Azure Storage Scalability and Performance Targets</legacyLink>.

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to delete Storage Analytics data: by manually making deletion requests or by setting a data retention policy.
trans-unit.target: There are two ways to delete Storage Analytics data: by manually making deletion requests or by setting a data retention policy.

trans-unit.source: Manual requests to delete Storage Analytics data are billable, but delete requests resulting from a retention policy are not billable.
trans-unit.target: Manual requests to delete Storage Analytics data are billable, but delete requests resulting from a retention policy are not billable.

trans-unit.source: To avoid unnecessary charges, set a retention policy for logging and metrics.
trans-unit.target: To avoid unnecessary charges, set a retention policy for logging and metrics.

trans-unit.source: Setting a Data Retention Policy
trans-unit.target: Setting a Data Retention Policy

trans-unit.source: You can configure two data retention policies: one for logging and one for metrics.
trans-unit.target: You can configure two data retention policies: one for logging and one for metrics.

trans-unit.source: When enabled for both, Storage Analytics will delete logs and table entries older than the specified number of days.
trans-unit.target: When enabled for both, Storage Analytics will delete logs and table entries older than the specified number of days.

trans-unit.source: The maximum retention period is 365 days (1 year).
trans-unit.target: The maximum retention period is 365 days (1 year).

trans-unit.source: When you make any changes to your retention policy, it may take several minutes for your settings to be applied.
trans-unit.target: When you make any changes to your retention policy, it may take several minutes for your settings to be applied.

trans-unit.source: To set up a policy that deletes both logging and metrics data after 7 days, make a request to the <link xlink:href="65424a3c-ab49-4994-865c-827409598092" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Blob Service Properties</link>, <link xlink:href="aff6740b-6ea5-4548-b226-322eb76dad94" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Table Service Properties</link>, or <link xlink:href="3ed99e96-b502-4543-9692-3c48343eeb2d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Queue Service Properties</link> operation with the <codeInline>%%amp;lt;RetentionPolicy%%amp;gt;</codeInline> nodes configured like shown:
trans-unit.target: To set up a policy that deletes both logging and metrics data after 7 days, make a request to the <link xlink:href="65424a3c-ab49-4994-865c-827409598092" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Blob Service Properties</link>, <link xlink:href="aff6740b-6ea5-4548-b226-322eb76dad94" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Table Service Properties</link>, or <link xlink:href="3ed99e96-b502-4543-9692-3c48343eeb2d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Queue Service Properties</link> operation with the <codeInline>%%amp;lt;RetentionPolicy%%amp;gt;</codeInline> nodes configured like shown:

trans-unit.source: The following XML shows the <codeInline>%%amp;lt;RetentionPolicy%%amp;gt;</codeInline> nodes in the context of complete payload for a Set Blob Service Properties request:
trans-unit.target: The following XML shows the <codeInline>%%amp;lt;RetentionPolicy%%amp;gt;</codeInline> nodes in the context of complete payload for a Set Blob Service Properties request:

trans-unit.source: You can also configure a retention policy that uses different periods for logging and metrics.
trans-unit.target: You can also configure a retention policy that uses different periods for logging and metrics.

trans-unit.source: To disable a retention policy in the future, call the Set Blob Service Properties operation with the <codeInline>%%amp;lt;Enabled%%amp;gt;</codeInline> node inside set to <system>false</system>, as shown below:
trans-unit.target: To disable a retention policy in the future, call the Set Blob Service Properties operation with the <codeInline>%%amp;lt;Enabled%%amp;gt;</codeInline> node inside set to <system>false</system>, as shown below:

trans-unit.source: If you disable Storage Analytics for a storage service but a data retention policy is enabled, your old data will continue to get deleted.
trans-unit.target: If you disable Storage Analytics for a storage service but a data retention policy is enabled, your old data will continue to get deleted.

trans-unit.source: To avoid accidental data loss, ensure that you configure your data retention policy when enabling and disabling Storage Analytics.
trans-unit.target: To avoid accidental data loss, ensure that you configure your data retention policy when enabling and disabling Storage Analytics.
